cdk.description: Used to interact with the AWS CDK. Wrapper around the 'cdk' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/v2/guide/cli.html)

generate-event.description: Used to generate AWS service-specific mock events. Wrapper around the 'sam local generate-event' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-generate-event.html)

invoke.description: Used to invoke a Lambda function locally. Wrapper around the 'sam local invoke' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-invoke.html)

start-api.description: Used to start an API Gateway locally. Wrapper around the 'sam local start-api' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-api.html)

start-lambda.description: Used to start all Lambda functions locally. Wrapper around the 'sam local start-lambda' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-start-lambda.html)
